丫子.definition: see 腳丫子|脚丫子[jiao3 ya1 zi5]

丫巴兒.definition: fork (of a tree, road, argument etc); bifurcation; fork junction

丫杈.definition: fork (of a tree); tool made of forked wood

丫角.definition: traditional hairstyle for children, with two pointy braids, giving it a horn-like appearance

丫頭.definition: girl; servant girl; (used deprecatingly, but sometimes also as a term of endearment)
